text: Q81. | When a process creates a new process, which of the following happens? (@) A child can execute only after its parent has terminated. (b) The parent continues to execute concurrently with its children. (c) The parent can execute only after all its children have executed and terminated. (d) Either (a) or (c) Answer: (b) It is not necessary that first parsent complete or child complete in between the execution of parent the child process might get chance therefore parent continues to execute concurrently with its children.
